<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/df2524bbb495c880d094d9542abf7c23d739cc53|patch 8.2.1495: "make clean" may delete too many files>
patch 8.2.1495: "make clean" may delete too many files

Problem:    "make clean" may delete too many files.
Solution:   Do not delete $APPDIR. (closes #6751)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1495: "make clean" may delete too many files · vim/vim@df2524b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1495: "make clean" may delete too many files · vim/vim@df2524b
attachments.text: Problem: "make clean" may delete too many files. Solution: Do not delete $APPDIR. (closes #6751)

patch 8.2.1492: build failures

Problem:    Build failures.
Solution:   Move typedef out of #ifdef.  Adjust argument types.  Discover
            America.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1492: build failures · vim/vim@20b23c6
attachments.text: Problem: Build failures. Solution: Move typedef out of #ifdef. Adjust argument types. Discover America.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/66250c932e8a0e3c43e7c7c7b1dbede040b9c508|patch 8.2.1491: Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with c…>
patch 8.2.1491: Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with comment

Problem:    Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with comment.
Solution:   Skip over NULL pointers. Do not remove comment and empty lines
            when fetching function lines. (closes #6743)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1491: Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with c… · vim/vim@66250c9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1491: Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with c… · vim/vim@66250c9
attachments.text: …omment Problem: Vim9: crash when compiling heredoc lines start with comment. Solution: Skip over NULL pointers. Do not remove comment and empty lines when fetching function lines...

patch 8.2.1490: Vim9: using /= with float and number doesn't work

Problem:    Vim9: using /= with float and number doesn't work.
Solution:   Better support assignment with operator. (closes #6742)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using /= with float and number doesn't work. Solution: Better support assignment with operator. (closes #6742)

patch 8.2.1489: Vim9: error when setting an option with setbufvar()

Problem:    Vim9: error when setting an option with setbufvar().
Solution:   Do not get a number from a string value. (closes #6740)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1489: Vim9: error when setting an option with setbufvar() · vim/vim@191929b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error when setting an option with setbufvar(). Solution: Do not get a number from a string value. (closes #6740)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a7c4e747639ad7642cd50ed577ff4c93db200df4|patch 8.2.1487: Travis: installing snd-dummy is not always useful>
patch 8.2.1487: Travis: installing snd-dummy is not always useful

Problem:    Travis: installing snd-dummy is not always useful.
Solution:   Only install snd-dummy on amd64. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6738)

attachments.text: Problem: Travis: installing snd-dummy is not always useful. Solution: Only install snd-dummy on amd64. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6738)
